message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.ED, cs.HC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a teaching strategy that leverages the underlying forgetting mechanisms of the learners, which can be seen as a form of machine learning. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes an optimization problem to adaptively teach forgetful learners, which can be seen as an AI problem. 
3. cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science): The paper proposes a computational approach to optimize the teaching strategy, which can be seen as a form of computational engineering. 
4. cs.ED (Computer Science and Education): The paper discusses the application of the proposed approach in educational apps, which can be seen as a form of computer science and education. 
5. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The paper also discusses user studies to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach, which can be seen as a form of human-computer interaction.
